required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study on the Progress of Breast Cancer Cases in Males and the Assessment of Relapse Risk
clinical_study.official_title: An Observational, Retrospective Study on the Progress of Breast Cancer Cases in Males and the Assessment of Relapse Risk Through Gene Sequencing

brief_summary.textblock: An observational, Other Designs (OD) post-marketing, multicenter study, which will obtain retrospective data from male patients diagnosed with invasive breast cancer between 2000 and 2017 in the medical oncology departments of hospitals that are associated with Spanish Breast Cancer Research Group (GEICAM) (using information obtained from patient medical histories).

detailed_description.textblock: One of the objectives of this project is to ensure representativeness of the cases referred to. Accordingly, participating sites agree to enroll in the study male patients who were diagnosed with breast cancer in the period between 2000 and 2017.

primary_outcome.measure: General condition: Age
primary_outcome.time_frame: From date of patient breast cancer diagnosis until 2017.
primary_outcome.description: General condition age will be recorded.

primary_outcome.measure: General condition: performance status at diagnosis
primary_outcome.time_frame: From date of patient breast cancer diagnosis until 2017.
primary_outcome.description: Performance status by Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) Scale

primary_outcome.measure: General condition and history: substance abuse
primary_outcome.time_frame: From date of patient breast cancer diagnosis until 2017.
primary_outcome.description: Number of Participants With Substance abuse of tobacco and alcohol will be recorded.

primary_outcome.measure: Diagnosis of other primary tumors
primary_outcome.time_frame: From date of patient breast cancer diagnosis until 2017.
primary_outcome.description: Diagnosis of other primary tumors synchronous or metachronous, will be recorded.

primary_outcome.measure: Body mass index (BMI)
primary_outcome.time_frame: From date of patient breast cancer diagnosis until 2017.
primary_outcome.description: BMI is a value derived from the mass (weight) and height. The BMI is defined as the body mass divided by the square of the body height, and is universally expressed in units of kg/m2, resulting from mass in kilograms and height in metres.

primary_outcome.measure: Primary comorbidities
primary_outcome.time_frame: From date of patient breast cancer diagnosis until 2017.
primary_outcome.description: Primary comorbidities will be recorded.

primary_outcome.measure: Mutational status of BReast CAncer gene (BRCA) or other genes of genetic predisposition
primary_outcome.time_frame: From date of patient breast cancer diagnosis until 2017.
primary_outcome.description: Mutational status of BRCA or other genes of genetic predisposition will be recorded.

primary_outcome.measure: Family history of cancer
primary_outcome.time_frame: From date of patient breast cancer diagnosis until 2017.
primary_outcome.description: Family history of cancer will be recorded.

primary_outcome.measure: Anatomopathological characteristics of the tumor: date of diagnosis
primary_outcome.time_frame: From date of patient breast cancer diagnosis until 2017.
primary_outcome.description: Date of diagnosis will be collected.

primary_outcome.measure: Anatomopathological characteristics of the tumor: histology
primary_outcome.time_frame: From date of patient breast cancer diagnosis until 2017.
primary_outcome.description: The histology of the tumor will be collected

primary_outcome.measure: Anatomopathological characteristics of the tumor: clinical and/or pathological stage
primary_outcome.time_frame: From date of patient breast cancer diagnosis until 2017.
primary_outcome.description: Tumor clinical and/or pathological stage will be collected through the tumor-node-metastasis (TNM) staging system of the Union for International Cancer Control (UICC).

primary_outcome.measure: Anatomopathological characteristics of the tumor: hormone-receptor expression
primary_outcome.time_frame: From date of patient breast cancer diagnosis until 2017.
primary_outcome.description: Hormone-receptor expression will be collected

primary_outcome.measure: Anatomopathological characteristics of the tumor: Human Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor 2 (HER-2) expression
primary_outcome.time_frame: From date of patient breast cancer diagnosis until 2017.
primary_outcome.description: Human Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor 2 (HER-2) expression will be collected

primary_outcome.measure: Anatomopathological characteristics of the tumor: histologic grade
primary_outcome.time_frame: From date of patient breast cancer diagnosis until 2017.
primary_outcome.description: Tumor histologic grade will be collected

primary_outcome.measure: Anatomopathological characteristics of the tumor: Ki-67
primary_outcome.time_frame: From date of patient breast cancer diagnosis until 2017.
primary_outcome.description: Tumor Ki-67 proliferation index will be collected

primary_outcome.measure: Anatomopathological characteristics of the tumor: lymphovascular invasion
primary_outcome.time_frame: From date of patient breast cancer diagnosis until 2017.
primary_outcome.description: Number of Participants With Presence of lymphovascular invasion will be collected

primary_outcome.measure: Treatment data: date of surgery
primary_outcome.time_frame: From date of patient breast cancer diagnosis until 2017.
primary_outcome.description: Will be collected date of surgery

primary_outcome.measure: Treatment data: type of surgery
primary_outcome.time_frame: From date of patient breast cancer diagnosis until 2017.
primary_outcome.description: Number of participants with each type of surgery: mastectomy or lumpectomy or quadrantectomy or lymphadenectomy or sentinel lymph node biopsy will be collected.

primary_outcome.measure: Treatment data: type of chemotherapy
primary_outcome.time_frame: From date of patient breast cancer diagnosis until 2017.
primary_outcome.description: Number of Participants With neoadjuvant chemotherapy and adjuvant chemotherapy.

primary_outcome.measure: Treatment data: adjuvant radiotherapy
primary_outcome.time_frame: From date of patient breast cancer diagnosis until 2017.
primary_outcome.description: Number of Participants With adjuvant radiotherapy

primary_outcome.measure: Treatment data: adjuvant hormonotherapy
primary_outcome.time_frame: From date of patient breast cancer diagnosis until 2017.
primary_outcome.description: Number of Participants With hormonotherapy

primary_outcome.measure: Treatment data: other type of anti-cancer treatment
primary_outcome.time_frame: From date of patient breast cancer diagnosis until 2017.
primary_outcome.description: Number of Participants With other type of anti-cancer treatment.

primary_outcome.measure: Follow-up data: relapse type
primary_outcome.time_frame: From date of patient breast cancer diagnosis until 2017.
primary_outcome.description: Number of Participants With each relapse type: local, regional or distant

primary_outcome.measure: Follow-up data: site of metastatic disease
primary_outcome.time_frame: From date of patient breast cancer diagnosis until 2017.
primary_outcome.description: Number of Participants With site of metastatic disease

primary_outcome.measure: Follow-up data: occurrence of other primary tumors
primary_outcome.time_frame: From date of patient breast cancer diagnosis until 2017.
primary_outcome.description: Number of Participants With occurrence of other primary tumors whether or not of breast origin (in situ or invasive).

primary_outcome.measure: Follow-up data: current condition
primary_outcome.time_frame: From date of patient breast cancer diagnosis until 2017.
primary_outcome.description: The date of the last review and current clinical condition will be recorded.

secondary_outcome.measure: Biological and molecular characteristics analyzed in primary tumors: tumor subtypes
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From date of patient breast cancer diagnosis until 2017.
secondary_outcome.description: Number of Participants With tumor subtypes, luminal profiles (e.g., luminal subtypes M1/M2, intrinsic subtypes)

secondary_outcome.measure: Biological and molecular characteristics analyzed in primary tumors: risk groups
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From date of patient breast cancer diagnosis until 2017.
secondary_outcome.description: Number of Participants With risk groups on the reference of breast cancer in women, including morphological analyses and description of the clinical profile (e.g., morphological type, differentiation (histologic grade), Estrogen Receptor (ER), Progesterone Receptor (PgR), Human Epidermal growth factor Receptor 2 (HER2), Androgen Receptor (AR), Ki-67).

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From date of patient breast cancer diagnosis until 2017.
secondary_outcome.description: Date and cause of death, when applicable.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From date of patient breast cancer diagnosis until 2017.
secondary_outcome.description: DFS: it is defined as the time from date of initial breast cancer diagnosis to the date of the first documented relapse event (local, regional and/or distant) of the disease, second breast or non-breast primary tumor, or death due to any cause, whichever occurs first. In the event that none of the previous events were observed, censoring the last contact date will be considered.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From date of patient breast cancer diagnosis until 2017.
secondary_outcome.description: DMFS: it is defined as the time from date of initial breast cancer diagnosis to the date of the first documented distant relapse, second invasive non-breast primary tumor, or death due to any cause, whichever occurs first. In the event that none of the previous events were observed, censoring the last contact date will be considered.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From date of patient breast cancer diagnosis until 2017.
secondary_outcome.description: PFS: it is defined as the time from the start date of a specific treatment to the documentation of disease progression on such treatment, or death due to any cause, whichever occurs first. In the event that none of the previous events were observed, censoring the last contact date will be considered.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From date of patient breast cancer diagnosis until 2017.
secondary_outcome.description: OS: it is defined as the time from the date of initial breast cancer diagnosis to the date of death due to any cause.

arm_group.description: The study target population is all cases of male breast cancer (MBC), diagnosed with invasive breast cancer between the years 2000 and 2017, and treated in the Medical Oncology Departments of participating sites.

biospec_descr.textblock: Tumor tissue samples will be collected and biological and genetic analyses will be performed.

study_pop.textblock: The study target population is all cases of male breast cancer (MBC), diagnosed with invasive breast cancer between the years 2000 and 2017, and treated in the Medical Oncology Departments of participating sites.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Male patients diagnosed with primary invasive breast carcinoma between the years 2000-2017, and who have been treated and/or followed up in the Medical Oncology Departments of participating sites.
- The enrollment of patients who died is allowed.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Male patients who do not wish to participate in the study for any reason.

overall_official.affiliation: Hospital Universitario Ramón y Cajal, Madrid, Spain

facility.name: Instituto Catalán de Oncología de L'Hospitalet
Hospital Clínico Universitario Virgen de la Arrixaca
Hospital de Tortosa Verge de la Cinta
Hospital Universitari Dexeus-Grupo Quirónsalud-Instituto Oncológico Dr. Rosell
Instituto Catalán de Oncología de Girona
Hospital Universitario Virgen de las Nieves
Hospital Central de la Defensa Gómez Ulla
Hospital Universitario Nuestra Señora De Candelaria
Hospital de Sant Pau i Santa Tecla

link.description: Spanish Breast Cancer Research Group (GEICAM) is a Spanish Breast Cancer Research Group
